page.title: 07Cottesmore Pathfinders
page.content: We go to Pathfinders every Sunday at 10:00am.Maxine,Paul,Christopher and I ride to Pathfinders on our bikes. On Saturday we sometimes go sailing on Rutland Water with the Pathfinders. We set off from Cottesmore at about 10:00am and arrive at about 10:30am. We then start to rig the boat up then we set sail, the water is quite cold! We learn a lot about God and Jesus. We learn a lot about the path finder as well.When we get there we give in our collection and have prayers.After prayers we talk about God.One week we might do a play about God,another week we might just talk about God.We have biscuits and a drink.When you have been in Pathfinders for 10 weeks you get your badge.It has the cross of Saint Andrew,Jesus'cross,the bible, a flame and a rope on it.
